# The `TinyPtrVector` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tinyptrvector">TinyPtrVector</a> - This class is specialized for cases where there are normally 0 or 1 element in a vector, but is general enough to go beyond that when required. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename EltTy&gt;
class llvm::TinyPtrVector&lt;EltTy&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tinyptrvector">TinyPtrVector</a> - This class is specialized for cases where there are normally 0 or 1 element in a vector, but is general enough to go beyond that when required.

NOTE: This container doesn&#39;t allow you to store a null pointer into it.

Definition at line 29 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/tinyptrvector-h">TinyPtrVector.h</a>.
